General.Name: China Resources Microelectronics Ltd
General.Description: China Resources Microelectronics Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and sale of semiconductors. The company offers power devices, power modules, power integrated circuits (IC), intelligent sensors, and intelligent controls. It also provides TV power sources, charger/adapters, wireless charging, UPS Power related products. In addition, the company offers electric bicycle; electric/garden tools; industrial welder; lithium battery protection; garden tools; vacuum cleaners; electric energy storage; portable energy storage; and high-power supply products. Further, it provides MOSFET products, IGBT discretes, bipolar transistors, fast recovery diode, schottky diode, zener diode, Sic diode, Sic mosfet, and cascode products. The company was formerly known as CSMC Technologies Corporation and changed its name to China Resources Microelectronics Limited in 2008. China Resources Microelectronics Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China. China Resources Microelectronics Limited is a subsidiary of China Resources (Holdings) Co.,Ltd.
